TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Annotation extends System.Object implements class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Annotation Implements IXmlSerializable

summary.span: Represents a user annotation in the Microsoft Annotations Framework.

span.span: Represents a user annotation in the Microsoft Annotations Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示与所有关联锚定和内容数据的单个注释。 represents a single annotation with all associated anchoring and content data. 批注包含的以下主要元素。An annotation consists of the following main elements. - 零、 一个或多个，用于标识要批注。Zero, one, or more that identify what is being annotated. - 零、 一个或多个包含批注的用户数据。Zero, one, or more that contain the user data for the annotation. - 零、 一个或多个用于定义批注的创建者。Zero, one, or more that define who created the annotation. - 一个，它指定的日期和时间创建批注。A that specifies the date and time when the annotation was created. - 一个，它指定上次更新时间批注。A that specifies when the annotation was last updated. - 唯一批注（全局唯一标识符 (GUID)）。A unique annotation (a globally unique identifier (GUID)).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

span.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 应用程序不应使用默认构造函数没有参数 – 默认构造函数不能完全初始化该实例。Applications should not use the default constructor without parameters–the default constructor does not fully initialize the instance. 若要创建一个新应用程序应使用基于参数的构造函数之一。To create a new applications should use one of the parameter-based constructors.

summary.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

span.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数由 WPF 序列化基础结构，不应直接在一般情况下使用。This constructor is used by the WPF serialization infrastructure and should not be used directly under ordinary circumstances.

summary.span: Occurs when an anchor is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

span.span: Occurs when an anchor is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了添加或删除，定位点时上对定位点子部件，如对更改进行任何修改发生。In addition to when an anchor is added or removed, occurs on any modifications to an anchor subpart, such as a change to a .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Anchors As Collection(Of AnnotationResource)

summary.span: Gets a collection of zero or more anchor elements that define the data selection(s) being annotated.

span.span: Gets a collection of zero or more anchor elements that define the data selection(s) being annotated.

value.span: 零个或多集合定位点元素。

span.span: A collection of zero or more anchor elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个在集合标识批注绑定到数据所选内容 （即，"数据的选择要批注"）。Each in the collection identifies a data selection to which the annotation is bound (in other words, "the data selection that is being annotated"). 虽然大多数批注引用单个数据选择，并包含一个定位点，如果一个批注引用多个保留的数据选择，则可能出现多个定位点。While most annotations refer to a single data selection and contain just one anchor , multiple anchors can occur if a single annotation refers to multiple data selections. 返回集合永远不会为 null; 但是，该集合可能包含零个元素。The returned collection is never null; however, the collection may contain zero elements.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AnnotationType As XmlQualifiedName
public: property System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^ AnnotationType { System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the of the annotation type.

span.span: Gets the of the annotation type.

value.span: 此类批注 XML 限定的名称。

span.span: The XML qualified name for this kind of annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的批注类型是名称作为参数传递给构造函数。The returned annotation type is the name passed as a parameter to the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 返回`null`如果批注不正确构造的使用不带参数的默认构造函数。 returns `null` if the annotation was incorrectly constructed by using a default constructor without parameters. (不带参数的默认构造函数不能完全初始化该实例和仅供内部使用，在使用 XML 序列化的组合。)若要创建新的批注，应用程序应使用构造函数采用作为参数。(The default constructor without parameters does not fully initialize the instance and is used only internally in combination with XML serialization.) To create a new annotation, applications should use the constructor that takes an as a parameter.

span.span: Gets a collection of zero or more author strings that identify who created the .

value.span: 零个或多个作者字符串的集合。

span.span: A collection of zero or more author strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回集合是永远不会`null`; 但是，如果没有作者指定集合可以包含零个元素。The returned collection is never `null`; however, the collection can contain zero elements if no author is specified.

summary.span: Occurs when a cargo is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

span.span: Occurs when a cargo is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了添加或删除，货物时上对货物细则，例如更改的任何修改发生中的货物的集合。In addition to when a cargo is added or removed, occurs on any modification to a cargo subpart, such as a change to an in the collection of a cargo.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cargos As Collection(Of AnnotationResource)

summary.span: Gets a collection of zero or more cargo elements that contain data for the annotation.

span.span: Gets a collection of zero or more cargo elements that contain data for the annotation.

value.span: 零个或多集合cargo 元素。

span.span: A collection of zero or more cargo elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个在集合包含用户定义数据批注。Each in the collection contains user-defined data for the annotation. 返回集合永远不会为 null; 但是，集合可能包含零个元素，如果没有用户数据的批注。The returned collection is never null; however, the collection may contain zero elements if there is no user data for the annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 返回如果使用默认错误地创建批注无参数构造函数。 returns if the annotation was incorrectly created by using the default constructor without parameters. 用于正确地实例化一个新的批注与参数的构造函数。An constructor with parameters should be used to correctly instantiate a new annotation.
